title: The New iFoneMate Data Recovery Software
text: The New iFoneMate Data Recovery Software The noted software solutions company GlobalShareWare announces the recent release of their new iPhone data recovery service. USA, 16 September 2015 -- In the midst of the information age, most people use their handheld devices to store their important documents, contacts and memories. When an unforeseen circumstance such as a virus, theft or disoperation happens, these people are often left without their precious data. The noted company GlobalShareWare recently launched a new iPhone data recovery service entitled iFoneMate. The iFoneMate data recovery software is compatible with all iOS 8 devices including the iPhone, iPad and iPod Touch. It can be used to restore lost iPhone data including contacts, messages, photos and more.“As a software solutions company, we often had customers asking us how to recover deleted iPhone contacts and data.” explains a GlobalShareWare representative. “We came up with the idea of iFoneMate in order to help these individuals who became victims to lost data.” To find out more information about iFoneMate iPhone data recovery, visit their website directly at http://www.globalshareware.com/ifonemate . # # # Contact Person: Sales Manager John Address: 1501 S. Mopac Expressway Suite 400, Austin, 78746
